main.primary_sponsor: First Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University.
main.public_title: The study on safety and efficacy of transplantation of placenta-derived mesenchymal stem cells for diabetic patients with ischemic peripheral vascular disease
main.scientific_title: The study on transplantation of placenta-derived mesenchymal stem cells for diabetic patients with ischemic peripheral vascular disease
main.hc_freetext: Diabetes and its ischemic vascular lesions

criteria.exclusion_criteria: those with severe heart, liver, renal insufficiency, severe cerebrovascular and lung disease are exclude; those with lower limb large area skin and soft tissue ulcer and gangrene or local infection before control are exclude.

primary_outcome.prim_outcome: number of collateral vessels formation ;Ankle brachial pressure index;Rest pain score;Cold feeling score;

secondary_outcome.sec_outcome: blood flow perfusion of Lower limb skin;transcutaneous oxygen pressure;

source_support.source_name: Jiangxi province science and technology plan key projects
